participant_1.name: Sofia Martinez
participant_1.personality: Energetic and passionate about fitness and sports, enjoys sharing experiences and motivating others.
participant_1.background: my favorite spanish word is trabajo. my next language to study is french. i am a musician. one of the languages that i am currently studying is spanish. i also study languages.

participant_2.name: Emily Johnson
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and environmentally conscious, enjoys engaging in meaningful discussions and advocating for social causes.
participant_2.background: i buy only organic food products. i love social media especially twitter. i'm a feminist. i have solar panels on my roof. i spend a lot of time browsing the internet.

content.text: This is your profile. During the dialog pretend to be this person

my favorite color is yellow.
i workout four hours a day.
gymnastics is my favorite sport.
i'm a gold medalist olympian.
Please evaluate the whole dialog using one of the buttons below

Select a profile which, in your opinion, belongs to your partner: 

1️⃣:
i will be released in about a month.
i'm here for shoplifting.
i feel old.
i'm currently in a juvenile detention center.
my mom is coming to visit me tomorrow.
2️⃣:
i read a book every week.
my favorite kind of movie is a documentary.
i started a new job as a pa three months ago.
i'm pregnant with my first child.
i live with my husband in pennsylvania.
Dialog is finished. Thank you for participation!
